title: ESA: Time to Assert Europe’s “Rightful Place” in Space
summary: The ministers of the European Space Agency’s member states today committed to a “paradigm shift” in the European space program and “asserting Europe’s rightful place in the world.” Meeting as […]

title: Canadian government backs 2024 space accelerator in Southern California
summary: Canadian space entrepreneurs seeking to raise $500,000 to $20 million are invited to join the 2024 SoCal-Canadian Space Accelerator.

title: ESA to start commercial cargo program
summary: The European Space Agency announced Nov. 6 it will start a competition to develop commercial vehicles to transport cargo to and from the International Space Station by 2028, a step towards developing a crewed vehicle.

title: LeoLabs data shows on-orbit maneuvers by Russian satellites
summary: The space tracking firm LeoLabs over the past year tracked two Russian satellites performing rendezvous and proximity operations.

title: Astra secures interim financing deal

title: SpaceX breaks its own record, launches Falcon 9 for the 18th time
summary: 23 Starlink satellites joined the constellation after successfully being launched into orbit atop a SpaceX Falcon 9 that was flying for a...

title: Dish Network CEO makes early exit
summary: Dish Network said its CEO Erik Carlson is resigning Nov. 12 ahead of the broadcaster’s merger with EchoStar, its sister company focused on providing broadband services from space, after posting a steep drop in satellite TV customers.

title: NASA's Curiosity Rover Clocks 4,000 Days on Mars
summary: The mission team is making sure the robotic scientist is staying strong, despite wear and tear from its 11-year journey.

title: Charting the Course: A Blueprint to Continued U.S. Leadership in Space
summary: We now live in a space-based economy. Satellites are providing everything from internet access to GPS guidance to storm tracking. You’d be hard-pressed to get through your day without relying on space-based services.

title: Ariane 6 cost and delays bring European launch industry to a breaking point
summary: "I certainly expect a paradigm shift on the launcher sector."
